title: France: Charming Sare Basque Country Heritage Stay
description: In the picturesque village of Sare, Hotel Arraya is a charming heritage stay a short distance from San Sebastian. This family-run hotel combines traditional decor, modern comfort and serene provincial vistas framed by lush gardens. Take a soothing hike through the countryside or delve into gargantuan limestone grottos to experience this region's natural treasures. On your return, savour locally sourced French cuisine at Arraya Restaurant or enjoy a glass of wine on the shaded terrace.
